Paul Igwe nti (amuru 27 Novemba 1977) bu onye isi ihe onyonyo Naijiria, odee, onye na-emeputa ihe, na onye okike, na onye isi oche nke Whitestone Cinema Limited
Ọ mepụtara ncha na-ewu ewu (usoro onyonyo) dị ka "Clinic Matters", "The Benjamin", "Ojays", na "Asunder".listen (help·info)".
N'afọ 2000, Paul Igwe malitere ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe nke ya, Whitestone Cinema Limited ma eduzila ihe nkiri 20 na usoro telivishọn 8

Ọ debuted na 2000 dị ka onye nduzi na ihe nkiri "Outrageous" na 2007;  ọ bụ onye isi ike na usoro ihe nkiri TV nke 39, "Ezinụlọ agbatịkwuru",  na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi / onye na-emepụta ihe na-enye ndụmọdụ
Ọ malitere sitcom telivishọn nke ya "Clinic Matters" na 2009, usoro nke meriri ọtụtụ onyinye na nhọpụta na mpaghara na mba ụwa gụnyere ihe nrite 2012 World Quality Commitment Award na Paris.
Na February 2012, o wepụtara usoro ihe onyonyo nke abụọ ya "The Benjamins" nke ahọpụtara na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards maka usoro ihe nkiri TV kacha mma Comedy/Drama.

N'afọ 2015, ọ malitere ihe nkiri ezinụlọ ọhụrụ "Ojays" nke a họpụtara maka onyinye Comedy kacha mma na Nafca Awards. Paul malitekwara ihe ngosi nri n'asụsụ Igbo nke a na-akpọ "USEKWU IGBO" nke pụtara 'Igbo Kitchen'
Ihe ngosi ahụ meriri ihe nrite Best Indigenous Movie / TV Series na 2016 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards nke emere na Eko Hotel and Suites, Victoria Island, Lagos.

N'afọ 2016, Paul malitere ihe nkiri ezinụlọ ọzọ a na-akpọ "House 6" nke ezinụlọ ọzọ a kpọrọ "Troubled Cottage" sochiri. Paul Igwe malitekwara usoro ihe nkiri nyocha ya, "Asunder", n'ikpeazụ n'afọ ahụ, nke na-elekwasị anya na ndụ alụmdi na nwunye nke ezinụlọ dị iche iche.

N'afọ 2017, o mepụtara ihe nkiri ncha ọzọ nke Igbo "Nkewa" nke gosipụtara na Africa Magic Igbo. O nyekwara ntụziaka "Dance To My Beat", ihe nkiri nke Joseph Benjamin, Kehinde Bankole, Toyin Abraham, na Mary Remmy Njoku.
